author: Andy Gregory, Andy Gregory
title: Coronavirus: Premature baby girl recovers after becoming 'Scotland's youngest Covid-19 patient'
description: Mother praises 'incredible' NHS staff who risked their lives 'to make sure my baby was fed and cuddled'
content:
A three-week-old baby believed to be Scotlands youngest coronavirus patient has recovered from the virus and is settling in at home with her parents.
Peyton Maguire was born eight weeks premature in Lanarkshire on 26 March, weighing just 3lbs 5oz.
